title: Eating with Sinners
description:
Jesus is on his way to Jerusalem. A crowd is following him because they want to see what the confrontation between Jesus and the authorities in Jerusalem will provide. Along the way he eats various times with Pharisees and Teachers of the law. The conversations are testy. They complain because Jesus also eats with tax collectors and sinners. Jesus explains why.

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU
